Contact us How can we help?
Tailored to Perfection Unlock Your Website's Potential with Navflow's Bespoke Designs We are a a startup company that is dedicated to providing tailored website design solutions to businesses of all sizes. With Navflow, you can be sure that every page on your website is made bespoke for you. We believe that your website should be unique, just like your business. That's why we take the time to understand your needs and goals, and create a custom design that reflects your brand and message.
Content delivery This is the part where we understand your needs
Step 1
Upon conformation we will set this step aside to understand your business.
Step 2
We will have meetings to develop a better understanding of how you picture your site
Step 3
In this step the development of your product will start, this means we will constantly work with you to create a working product
Step 4
This is where we will deploy the solution or extend the product period to incoperate any changes you want
Our packages What do we offer? Since we are still only a start-up company we offer two packages. These packages are open to being expanded in the future.
NON-PRODUCTION £0
  • Two page website
  • Two banner designs
  • Cross-browser compatibility
  • Comprehensive guides for running locally
  • Mobile responsive
BASIC £150
  • Five-page website
  • Three banner designs
  • Cross-browser compatibility
  • Money back guarantee
  • Mobile responsive
BASIC PLUS £300
  • Ten-page website
  • Six banner designs
  • Cross-browser compatibility
  • Money back guarantee
  • Mobile responsive
Decoding Our Pricing: Your Guide to Transparent Costs
Non-production: Our package offers an ideal solution for those seeking to create a website that is not intended for selling products. It's worth noting that we do provide a plan that caters to small businesses who do not anticipate making significant changes to their website after deployment. However, we would like to inform you that any modifications made post-deployment may incur additional charges. We are committed to providing exceptional service and ensuring that your website accurately reflects your business's goals and values.
Basic: Our package has been thoughtfully crafted for start-up companies or businesses seeking a web presence without being overly dependent on it. With this package, we will set up hosting and design and develop a website tailored to your business needs. Our team is committed to ensuring that your website is designed with your brand in mind, so you can effectively communicate your unique value proposition to your audience. We strive to provide exceptional service and support, so you can focus on growing your business while we handle the technical details of your website.
Basic plus: This package builds upon the features offered in the basic package, providing you with even greater flexibility and the ability to make additional changes during the project's development. We understand that every business has unique needs, and this package offers the versatility required to accommodate those needs. We believe that more is always better, and we are committed to delivering a product that exceeds your expectations. With this package, you can rest assured that you will receive the highest quality service and support, ensuring that your website is a true reflection of your business.
FAQ Frequently asked questions
?
What is a startup? it means we are a newly formed business. Even with this in mind, we still aim to give 100% to each project that comes our way
?
Will this effect us? No, we only take on projects that we're capable of seeing through to the finish
?
Do we have experience? Combined we have over five years of working in different ends of development
?
What if something goes wrong? If something goes wrong with your product we will aim to fix it, if the project is complete we will still offer support
?
What sort of support is offered post deployment? Support is offered within reason. Changes are not free, however, bug fixes are (if they were our fault).
?
What if I need something changed? This will cost, however, since the project is already finished, the price will vary based on the scale of the request
